title: Cross-post your blog posts
description: This workflow uses [Strapi](https://strapi.io/) as a CMS and then cross posts new blog posts to [Medium](https://medium.com/) and [Dev.to](https://dev.to/).
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
